ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] New Song?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The name needs to change   We already have that bind-sight song that s called Solidarity.  But that s trivial ;) ... Hell, I pay them to make their
ygData.messageBody:
> Name: Song of Solidarity

The name needs to change <g> We already have that 'bind-sight'
song that's called Solidarity. But that's trivial ;)

> Function: Whenever a member of the party takes damage, that damage it
> distributed among the party members.

Hell, I pay them to make their game flexible and the best it can
be. You all do too. I wouldn't rule out ideas based on whether
or not it can be done. Because if we did that, we'd have no songs
at all... hahaha... errr, that was bad... anyway. I like your
idea, needs to be fleshed out more, maybe tweaked, but it's most
definitely original. That song coupled with Group Healing would
be really nice. And like I said before, if we present a decent
list of possibilities to them they may come up with something
similiar.

Nice idea!

Harmonic.
